com.soa.wsdl.model
Interface WsdlBinding

All Superinterfaces:
com.soa.model.BaseObject, java.io.Serializable
public interface WsdlBinding
extends com.soa.model.BaseObject

Represents a binding in WSDL.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBindingKey()
          Returns the unique key to the binding.

          Returns the binding's QName.

          Returns the binding type.

          Returns the description of the binding.
